text.div:
Generated Narrative: ConceptMap subject2FHIR-eu-hdr

Mapping from (not specified) to (not specified)


Group 1 Mapping from A.1.1 - Identification and A.1.2 - related contact information of the Patient/subject to Patient (EU core)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
subjectIdentification (A.1.1 - Identification of the patient/subject)is equivalent toPatient
subjectIdentification.given (A.1.1.1 - Given name)is equal toPatient.name.given
subjectIdentification.family (A.1.1.2 - Family name/surname)is equal toPatient.name.family
subjectIdentification.birthDate (A.1.1.3 - Date of birth)is equal toPatient.birthDate
subjectIdentification.identifier (A.1.1.4 - National healthcare patient ID)is equal toPatient.identifier
subjectIdentification.nationality (A.1.1.5 - Nationality)is equivalent toPatient.extension:nationality.valueCodeableConcepthttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/patient-nationality
subjectIdentification.gender (A.1.1.6 - Gender)is equal toPatient.gender
subjectIdentification.countryOfAffiliation (A.1.1.7 - Country of affiliation)(not mapped)Not mapped on purpose
subjectContact (A.1.2 - Patient/subject related contact information)is related toPatient
subjectContact.personalContact (A.1.2.1 - Patient address)is related toPatient
subjectContact.personalContact.address (A.1.2.1.1 - Address)is equivalent toPatient.address
subjectContact.personalContact.telecom (A.1.2.1.2 - Telecom)is equivalent toPatient.telecom
subjectContact.preferredHP (A.1.2.2 - Preferred health professional (HP) - This section can be repeated and linked to any specific information in the document, for example a link between a rare disease problem and the rare disease specialist responsible for the care of the individual patient (this section).)is equivalent toPatient.generalPractitioner
subjectContact.contactPerson (A.1.2.3 - Contact person/ legal guardian (multiple contacts could be provided))is related toPatient.contact
subjectContact.contactPerson.role (A.1.2.3.1 - Role of that person)is equivalent toPatient.contact.relationship:role
subjectContact.contactPerson.relationship (A.1.2.3.2 - Relationship level)is equivalent toPatient.contact.relationship:type
subjectContact.contactPerson.given (A.1.2.3.4 - Given name)is equivalent toPatient.contact.name.given
subjectContact.contactPerson.family (A.1.2.3.5 - Family name/surname)is equal toPatient.contact.name.family
subjectContact.contactPerson.address (A.1.2.3.6 - Address)is equivalent toPatient.contact.address
subjectContact.contactPerson.telecom (A.1.2.3.7 - Telecom)is equivalent toPatient.contact.telecom
subjectContact.contactPerson.organization (A.1.2.3.8 - Contact person organisation)is equivalent toPatient.contact

Group 2 Mapping from A.1.1 - Identification and A.1.2 - related contact information of the Patient/subject to http://hl7.eu/fhir/core/StructureDefinition/practitioner-eu-core

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
subjectContact.preferredHP (A.1.2.2 - Preferred health professional (HP) - This section can be repeated and linked to any specific information in the document, for example a link between a rare disease problem and the rare disease specialist responsible for the care of the individual patient (this section).)is equivalent toPractictioner
subjectContact.preferredHP.identifier (A.1.2.2.1 - Identifier of the HP)is equivalent toPractictioner.identifier
subjectContact.preferredHP.name (A.1.2.2.2 - Name of the HP)is equivalent toPractictioner.name
subjectContact.preferredHP.address (A.1.2.2.5 - Address)is equivalent toPractictioner.address
subjectContact.preferredHP.telecom (A.1.2.2.6 - Telecom)is equivalent toPractictioner.telecom

Group 3 Mapping from A.1.1 - Identification and A.1.2 - related contact information of the Patient/subject to http://hl7.eu/fhir/core/StructureDefinition/practitionerRole-eu-core

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
subjectContact.preferredHP (A.1.2.2 - Preferred health professional (HP) - This section can be repeated and linked to any specific information in the document, for example a link between a rare disease problem and the rare disease specialist responsible for the care of the individual patient (this section).)is equivalent toPractictionerRolepreferred
subjectContact.preferredHP.identifier (A.1.2.2.1 - Identifier of the HP)is equivalent toPractictionerRole.identifierpreferred
subjectContact.preferredHP.name (A.1.2.2.2 - Name of the HP)is equivalent toPractictionerRole.practictioner.namepreferred
subjectContact.preferredHP.role (A.1.2.2.3 - Role of the HP)is equivalent toPractictionerRole.code
subjectContact.preferredHP.organization (A.1.2.2.4 - HP Organisation)is equivalent toPractictionerRole.organization
subjectContact.preferredHP.address (A.1.2.2.5 - Address)is related toPractictionerRole.addresspreferred
subjectContact.preferredHP.telecom (A.1.2.2.6 - Telecom)is related toPractictionerRole.telecompreferred
